Activity: Arrive at the office, log in to the computer, and check emails.
Review emails and prepare for the joint testing session with @EHRDEV-1 and @EHRDEV-2.
Conduct the joint testing session for the automated validation rules with @EHRDEV-1 and @EHRDEV-2. Document the results of each test case, including any errors or unexpected behavior.
Analyze the testing results. Identify any validation rules that are not functioning as expected or require adjustments.
Work with @EHRDEV-1 and @EHRDEV-2 to modify the automated validation rules to correct any identified issues. Retest the modified rules to ensure they are functioning correctly.
Continue testing and refining the automated validation rules until all issues are resolved. Document the final configuration of each rule.

Prepare a summary report of the automated validation rule testing, including the test results, issues identified, and resolutions implemented. Send it to @Clinlead-1, @ITPM-1, and @DA-1 for review. Topic: Automated Validation Rule Testing Results
Begin planning for the implementation of regular audits of abstracted data. Define the scope and frequency of the audits.
Browse the web for information about Quality Assurance standards in hospitals.
Update the task progress in the project management system. Prepare for tomorrow's tasks.
